tool_description: Get 16 days weather forecast data worldwide based on geographical coordinates.

api_list.name: Index
api_list.description: See the current API version. Here is the link to the documentation.

forecastDate.description: Date of last update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

clouds.description: Cloudage in % (high clouds, low clouds, middle clouds)

date.description: Date, beginning of timespan, format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SSZ

class.description: Precipitation class (0: no, 1: light, 2: mid, 3: heavy)

text.description: Short weather text for calculated interpretation

nextUpdate.description: Date of next update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

class.description: Precipitation class (0: no, 1: light, 2: mid, 3: heavy)

text.description: Short weather text for calculated interpretation

nextUpdate.description: Date of next update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

api_list.name: RapidApiGetObservationHistoryByStationId
api_list.description: Get historical weather information for a specific station.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Show historical data from a specific date.

latitude.description: Value between -90 and 90. Latitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)

longitude.description: Value between -180 and 180. Longitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)

api_list.name: GetStatus
api_list.description: Check if the API is running.

api_list.name: RapidApiGetForecastSummaryByLocationName
api_list.description: Get forecast summary for a specific location.

forecastDate.description: Date of last update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

class.description: Precipitation class (0: no, 1: light, 2: mid, 3: heavy)

text.description: Short weather text for calculated interpretation

nextUpdate.description: Date of next update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

latitude.description: Value between -90 and 90. Latitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)

longitude.description: Value between -180 and 180. Longitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)

api_list.name: RapidApiGetHourlyForecastByLocationName
api_list.description: Get hourly forecast for a specific location.
